title: Himi 29
lyrics:
4-6 &2-8’s
1.
Ke fai loto taha
‘A e ngaahi kakai
‘Oku ‘i ‘olunga
Mo māmani foki;
Ke tau fakaongo lelei
‘A e huafa ‘o Sīsū.
2.
Ko e Lami ia
‘A hotau ‘Otua
Ko hono huafa
‘Oku ongoongo,
He ko e mo’ui ‘anga
Ki he kakai angahala.
3.
‘Oku ongo lelei
‘A hono huafa
Ki he anga kovi
‘Oku loto feinga,
Ko e huafa ‘o Sīsū
Ko e unga’anga ia.
4.
Pea ka ongo’i
‘E he angahala
‘A hono huafa
Pea fiefia,
Pea ‘i he’ene tui
‘Oku fiemālie ai. *
